Pre-Game Insights: Rhett Lowder gets the nod for the Cincinnati Reds on Saturday against Oneil Cruz and the Pittsburgh Pirates.
First pitch is at 1:10 p.m. ET for this second game in a three-game series.
The Reds are the favorite in this one, at -123, while the Pirates have +104 odds to win.
The total is 9 runs for the matchup (with -118 odds to hit the over and -101 odds on the under)
